key_achievements: ✅ TypeScript Strict Mode - 100% enabled (frontend + backend likely)
✅ Datadog RUM + APM - Comprehensive monitoring operational
✅ Drizzle ORM Migration - All raw SQL eliminated
✅ Code Splitting - 80%+ bundle reduction via lazy loading
✅ Memory Leak Detection - Datadog profiling enabled
✅ Retool Admin Platform - Operational with PostgreSQL access
critical_gaps: ❌ Component Refactoring - Monoliths still exist (DataWorkbench 2k lines)
❌ Tenant Isolation - Missing/nullable tenant_id in 6+ tables
❌ Folder Structure - Flat vs domain-based organization
